title: 062 - Big Motor Derails The Show
description: On today's show, the boys are joined by Gumpy as he gives an update live from Canada, and then get right into the Folder of Death on this feel good Friday. They discuss things like what would be the five restaurants in their mall food court, Tony struggles with several actors/actresses and movie names, Billy Tubes does his best to derail the show in any way that he can, and the guys move through the folder to help send you into the weekend. Don't forget to send your questions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. As always, stay safe out there, enjoy, and have a great weekend.
dc:creator: The Pod
